title: SOLD 1905 Clevleand Naps RPPC by Souvenir Post Card Shop
author: T206Jim

posts.post_title: SOLD 1905 Clevleand Naps RPPC by Souvenir Post Card Shop
posts.post_content:
For sale is this 1905 RPPC depicting the Cleveland Naps issued by The Souvenir Post Card Shop in Cleveland. The T206 image for the Lajoie portrait and several others.  Postally stamped in 1905 it is in a SGC 10 holder.

A lesser condition copy just sold in Lelands December monthly auction for over $2,000. If you were an under bidder here is your shot to acquire a nicer one for less.  [url]https://auction.lelands.com/bids/bidplace?itemid=92651[/url]

SOLD

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=338201&d=1545438109[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=338202&d=1545438117[/IMG]
Sweet card Jim, should sell quick.  Love the pre 1907 PCs.

Really like early postally used PC's most all have
beautiful penmanship and postmark adds to the history IMO.
